content: let me show you how to take a big pile of ugly or old scrap yarn and make this set of crochet nesting baskets this is a great stash busting scrap yarn project this is a great beginner crochet tutorial this is a 9-page pdf with a written out pattern i give step by step details on how to make this set of scrap yarn baskets as well as useful information to modify and make any size baskets us crochet terms my examples measure approximately 9x9 9x10 and 9x12 but i give info on how to make them in other sizes you can use any colors and make a fun unique set of baskets to use as home decor or give as gifts materials any type of yarn can be used for this project my example uses mainly #4 size yarn in assorted brands i give a lot of details in my pattern on how to choose the proper yarn and hooks to make this project there is no yardage listed for this pattern as it is a scrap yarn project and i have pulled dozens of ugly skeins and partially used skeins to make these baskets you will also see a very large oval basket pattern in my shop that was made in conjunction with these nesting baskets i am here all to help and support you in any way i can after you download my pattern i would love to see your scrappy yarn baskets made from this pattern so please tag me on ig @theburgundybasket due to the nature of pdf and it being an instant download i cant refund your fee -which i ve kept low - but am here to assist if you need please let me know if you find any errors or have any trouble
